Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.util.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends Object
    Utility class for various operations used in the codebase.

      • logAndSendMessage

        public static void logAndSendMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                     String message)
        Sends a message to the given sender (null safe), and logs the message to the console. This method is aware that the command sender might be the console sender and avoids displaying the message twice in this case.
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to inform
        message - the message to log and send

      • logAndSendWarning

        public static void logAndSendWarning(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                     String message)
        Sends a warning to the given sender (null safe), and logs the warning to the console. This method is aware that the command sender might be the console sender and avoids displaying the message twice in this case.
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to inform
        message - the warning to log and send

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the collection is null or empty, false otherwise

        public static boolean isEmailEmpty(String email)
        Returns whether the given email is empty or equal to the standard "undefined" email address.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the email is empty
